ipi-rib:routing.description: RIB Master for system wide configurations

ipv4-enable-bfd-all-interfaces.description: Use this attribute to enable static BFD on all interfaces.

ipv6-enable-bfd-all-interfaces.description: Use this attribute to enable ipv6 static BFD on all interfaces.

fib-retain.description: Use this attribute to configure retain time for stale routes (forever or specific time in seconds) in FIB after RIB restarts

max-ecmp-paths.description: Use this attribute to set the maximum number of paths to install in the FIB (Forwarding Information Base) for the ECMP (Equal-Cost MultiPath) feature.

max-static-routes.description: Use this attribute to set the maximum number of static routes.

max-fib-routes.description: Use this attribute to set the maximum number of FIB (Forwarding Information Base) routes excluding kernel, connected, and static routes.
